languages.text: "Сбор, а тем более складирование десятины лишены смысла. Зев закрыт и неизвестно когда откроется снова. Лучше бы ее вообще не собирали".

"Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."
languages.original_text: "Сбор, а тем более складирование десятины лишены смысла. Зев закрыт и неизвестно когда откроется снова. Лучше бы ее вообще не собирали".

traits.locale_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, let alone stockpiling it. The Maw is closed and there is no telling when it will reopen. It would have been better if it hadn't been collected at all."
"Collecting the tithe is meaningless, let alone stockpiling it. The Maw is closed and there is no telling when it will reopen. It would have been better if it hadn't been collected at all."

"Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it will reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

"Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it will reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

"Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

languages.text: «Recolectar el diezmo es absurdo, no digamos ya acumularlo. Las Fauces están cerradas y no podemos saber cuándo se volverán a abrir. Lo mejor habría sido no exigir el diezmo hasta que cambiara la situación».
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: «Recolectar el diezmo es absurdo, no digamos ya acumularlo. Las Fauces están cerradas y no podemos saber cuándo se volverán a abrir. Lo mejor habría sido no exigir el diezmo hasta que cambiara la situación».

languages.text: “征收什一税简直毫无意义，更别说把它储存在这种地方。巨口已经过不去了，没人知道什么时候才能恢复正常，这些什一税还不如不收呢。”
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: “征收什一税简直毫无意义，更别说把它储存在这种地方。巨口已经过不去了，没人知道什么时候才能恢复正常，这些什一税还不如不收呢。”

languages.text: 「租税を貯蔵することは言うまでもなく、それを集めることには意味がない。マウは閉じており、それがいつ再び開くかはわからない。租税がまったく集められていなかったら、どんなにか良かっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: 「租税を貯蔵することは言うまでもなく、それを集めることには意味がない。マウは閉じており、それがいつ再び開くかはわからない。租税がまったく集められていなかったら、どんなにか良かっただろう」

languages.text: « Collecter la dîme ne sert à rien, sans même parler de l'emmagasiner. La Gueule est fermée, et nul ne sait quand elle se rouvrira. Il aurait été préférable de suspendre tout bonnement la collecte. »
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: « Collecter la dîme ne sert à rien, sans même parler de l'emmagasiner. La Gueule est fermée, et nul ne sait quand elle se rouvrira. Il aurait été préférable de suspendre tout bonnement la collecte. »

languages.text: "Aşarı toplamanın hiçbir anlamı yok, onu istiflemekten bahsetmiyorum bile. Ağız kapalı, ne zaman açılacağını bilmek imkânsız. Aşar hiç toplanmasa daha iyi olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: "Aşarı toplamanın hiçbir anlamı yok, onu istiflemekten bahsetmiyorum bile. Ağız kapalı, ne zaman açılacağını bilmek imkânsız. Aşar hiç toplanmasa daha iyi olurdu."

languages.text: "Die Eintreibung des Zehnts ist sinnlos, von seiner Lagerung ganz zu schweigen. Der Schlund ist geschlossen und niemand weiß, wann er sich wieder öffnet. Es wäre besser gewesen, wenn der Zehnt gar nicht erst eingetrieben worden wäre."
languages.original_text: "Collecting the tithe is meaningless, to say nothing of stockpiling it. The Maw is closed, and there is no telling when it might reopen. It would have been better if the tithe hadn't been collected at all."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eintreibung des Zehnts ist sinnlos, von seiner Lagerung ganz zu schweigen. Der Schlund ist geschlossen und niemand weiß, wann er sich wieder öffnet. Es wäre besser gewesen, wenn der Zehnt gar nicht erst eingetrieben worden wäre."
